thread.section_title: Hotel Xenia Autograph Collection - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (London, England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Wonderful Hotel Experience
thread.title_full: Wonderful Hotel Experience - Review of Hotel Xenia Autograph Collection, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: peterpS4843UF
title: Wonderful Hotel Experience
text:
I thoroughly enjoyed my 3 night stay at the Xenia Hotel. Perfect Location for touring London. Easily accessed within walking distance from either Gloucester Underground Station or Earls Court Station. Hotel amenities are great and the staff are all very courteous and helpful.
I would highly recommend the Xenia Hotel and will definitely be back.
